entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain showers or flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023
